channel.title: Data Structures on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Data Structures on C'est la Z

item.title: A* is born
item.description: Over on the CS Educator StachExchange, which is in private beta for a few more days, I saw a post asking about how to introduce the A* search algorithm. I taught A* as part of the APCS class at Stuy so I thought I'd talk about what I did here. Some time around mid year, we get to intermediate recursion. This is about the time, give or take, when we talk about the nlogn sorts.
